title: Dockerizing .NET Core Applications
description: In this workshop, you will learn enough of the Docker fundamentals to create a .NET Core solution running in Docker

courses.title: Basic Docker Commands
courses.description: Learn how to manage containers using Docker

courses.title: Hosting a Web Server in Docker
courses.description: Learn how to host a web server using Docker

courses.title: .NET Core on Docker Hub
courses.description: Learn how to use the official .NET Core's images on Docker Hub
